description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Dot Wars is an arcade style shoot-em-up game that supports up to four local players. Choose from any of the four commanders of the dot armies and take to the battlefield, guns blazing. Game objectives range from classical 1-on-1-on-1-on-1 brawls to cooperation in taking down legions of doom. Capture flags in electrical power plants or hunt down your enemies while relaxing by the lava riverside.
